018
019package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi;
020
021import static java.util.concurrent.Executors.newCachedThreadPool;
022import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
028
029import java.lang.ref.Reference;
030import java.lang.ref.WeakReference;
031import java.util.ArrayList;
032import java.util.Collection;
033import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
034import java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory;
035import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
036
037import org.apiguardian.api.API;
038import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigBeanSpec;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigurationChangeEvent;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigurationChangeListener;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.AutoLock;
043
044/**
045 *  Provides support the event handling to the configuration beans.
046 *
047 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
048 *  @version $Id: ConfigChangeListenerSupport.java 930 2021-06-20 18:08:47Z tquadrat $
049 *  @since 0.0.1
050 *
051 *  @UMLGraph.link
052 */
053@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ConfigChangeListenerSupport.java 930 2021-06-20 18:08:47Z tquadrat $" )
054@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
055public class ConfigChangeListenerSupport
056{
057        /*------------*\
058    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
059        \*------------*/
060    /**
061     *  The owner of this support component.
062     */
063    private final ConfigBeanSpec m_Owner;
064
065    /**
066     *  The registry for the listeners.
067     */
068    private final Collection<WeakReference<ConfigurationChangeListener>> m_Listeners = new ArrayList<>();
069
070    /**
071     *  The read lock for the listener's registry.
072     */
073    private final AutoLock m_ReadLock;
074
075    /**
076     *  The thread pool for the notifier threads.
077     */
078    private final ExecutorService m_ThreadPool;
079
080    /**
081     *  The write lock for the listener's registry.
082     */
083    private final AutoLock m_WriteLock;
084
085        /*--------------*\
086    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
087        \*--------------*/
088    /**
089     *  Creates a new {@code ConfigChangeListenerSupport} instance.
090     *
091     *  @param  owner   The owner of this instance of
092     *      {@code ConfigChangeListenerSupport}.
093     */
094    public ConfigChangeListenerSupport( final ConfigBeanSpec owner )
095    {
096        m_Owner = requireNonNullArgument( owner, "owner" );
097
098        //---* Create the locks *----------------------------------------------
099        final var lock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();
100        m_ReadLock = AutoLock.of( lock.readLock() );
101        m_WriteLock = AutoLock.of( lock.writeLock() );
102
103        //---* Create the thread pool *----------------------------------------
104        final var threadGroup = new ThreadGroup( format( "%s:Notifiers", getClass().getName()) );
105        final ThreadFactory threadFactory = r -> new Thread( threadGroup, r, format( "%s:Notifier", getClass().getName() ) );
106        m_ThreadPool = newCachedThreadPool( threadFactory );
107    }   //  ConfigChangeListenerSupport()
108
109        /*---------*\
110    ====** Methods **==========================================================
111        \*---------*/
112    /**
113     *  Adds a new listener.
114     *
115     *  @param  listener    The new listener.
116     */
117    public final void addListener( final ConfigurationChangeListener listener )
118    {
119        requireNonNullArgument( listener, "listener" );
120        try( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final var l = m_WriteLock.lock() )
121        {
122            //---* Copy the current registry *---------------------------------
123            final var copy = m_Listeners.stream()
124                .filter( r -> nonNull( r.get() ) )
125                .collect( toList() );
126
127            //---* Clear the current registry *--------------------------------
128            m_Listeners.clear();
129
130            //---* Add the new listener *--------------------------------------
131            if( copy.stream().map( Reference::get ).noneMatch( r -> r == listener ) )
132            {
133                m_Listeners.add( new WeakReference<>( listener ) );
134            }
135
136            //---* Put back the copy *-----------------------------------------
137            m_Listeners.addAll( copy );
138        }
139    }   //  addListener()
140
141    /**
142     *  Fires the event to all registered listeners. Each listener will be
143     *  called in its own thread.
144     *
145     *  @param  propertyName    The name of the property.
146     *  @param  oldValue    The old value; can be {@code null}.
147     *  @param  newValue    The new value; can be {@code null}.
148     */
149    public final void fireEvent( final String propertyName, final Object oldValue, final Object newValue )
150    {
151        requireNotEmptyArgument( propertyName, "propertyName" );
152
153        try( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final var l = m_ReadLock.lock() )
154        {
155            if( !m_Listeners.isEmpty() )
156            {
157                final var event = new ConfigurationChangeEvent( m_Owner, propertyName, oldValue, newValue );
158                for( final var listenerRef : m_Listeners )
159                {
160                    final var listener = listenerRef.get();
161                    if( nonNull( listener ) ) m_ThreadPool.submit( () -> listener.propertyChange( event ) );
162                }
163            }
164        }
165    }   //  fireEvent()
166
167    /**
168     *  Removes the given listener.
169     *
170     *  @param  listener    The listener to remove.
171     */
172    public final void removeListener( final ConfigurationChangeListener listener )
173    {
174        if( nonNull( listener ) )
175        {
176            try( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final var l = m_WriteLock.lock() )
177            {
178                //---* Copy the current registry *-----------------------------
179                final var copy = m_Listeners.stream()
180                    .filter( r -> nonNull( r.get() ) )
181                    .filter( r -> r.get() != listener )
182                    .collect( toList() );
183
184                //---* Clear the current registry *----------------------------
185                m_Listeners.clear();
186
187                //---* Put back the copy *-------------------------------------
188                m_Listeners.addAll( copy );
189            }
190        }
191    }   //  removeListener()
192}
193//  class ConfigChangeListenerSupport
194
195/*
196 *  End of File
197 */
